key_risks: Profitability challenges due to high content acquisition costs and operational expenses
Intense competition from established and emerging streaming platforms
Regulatory risks related to sports betting operations
Legal and litigation risks from multiple lawsuits
User data privacy concerns and potential violations
controversies: Antitrust lawsuit against major content providers (Disney, Fox, Warner Bros.)
Class-action lawsuit alleging unlawful sharing of subscriber data with third parties
Settlement with Disney, Fox, and Warner Bros. over Venu Sports disputes
social_issues: Data privacy violations and potential harm to consumer trust
Ethical concerns over sharing subscriber data without proper consent
governance_issues: Legal and regulatory challenges impacting governance and operational decisions
Stock volatility and financial performance concerns
